title: Alien Abduction
description: A composite collection of designed Sci Fi elements perfect to enhace any scene involving interior/exterior spaceship - UFO activity and futuristic mechanical parts.
longDescription:
In this package you'll find mechanical movement sounds, spaceship interior ambiences, space vehicle fly fy, passs by, stutters, different spacecraft engine noises and user interface elements great for sci-fi, promos, trailers, openers, cyborg / robot / alien machines sequences, and other modern projects.


You can listen to some samples in the preview;

https://youtu.be/xELwlpS5lRc
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  27 robotic transforming sound elements, with distinct glitches, hits, pulses and industrial mechanical motions.
  •  15 tense, spacey spaceship interior ambiences, with machine humming, glitchy and pulse repetitive elements.
  • 15 Sci-fi styled rich, textured whooshes to depict the movement of an alien spaceship.
  • 15 Well designed spaceship pass by / stutters.
  • 4 Mechanical roars, engine sounds and noises.
  • 25 infographic style sound designs, ideal for hi tech devices, holograms and alien spaceships.


Number of Audio Waves: 101

Number of Audio Cues:101

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 bit 96Khz

Do Sound FX loop: Ambiences and engine sounds loop seamlessly.

Minutes of audio provided: 12:37

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
